item.title: how i created a trigger warnings modal, and removed it for accessibility
item.description:
When I first had my coming out story reviewed by some queer peers, the initial feedback I received was that it required "trigger warnings" because it covered some pretty heavy topics.

My initial solution was simple;- add a row to the post information section highlighting the various trigger warnings in …
item.dc:creator: Dafne Kiyui

item.title: on taking a break
item.description: It is almost poetic justice that the last time I wrote was on Labour Day, 2019. Not long thereafter, I went on a slurry of vacations from Bangkok for 2 bachelor parties, Georgia for a wedding, a multitude of places for Europe, finally ending my streak by attending the Pride …
item.dc:creator: Dafne Kiyui
